summary: The implementation successfully delivers all four core requirements with high fidelity. The Quran feature includes all 114 surahs with Arabic text and English translations, complete with intuitive navigation. Prayer times are calculated for five daily prayers based on user-selected location. The Islamic calendar displays major festivals with both Gregorian and Hijri dates. The visual design employs an Islamic-inspired aesthetic with gold, emerald, and teal colors, geometric patterns, and elegant typography. All acceptance criteria are met.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode support with complete color palette definitions
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention dark mode or theme switching. The implementation includes extensive dark mode color definitions in frontend/src/index.css and frontend/index.css.

The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or personalization features' as a non-goal. However, the implementation includes InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and AuthClient integration.

While displaying prayer times is required, the BuildRequest does not specify real-time highlighting of the current/next prayer. The implementation includes getCurrentPrayer() logic that dynamically highlights which prayer is current.
